name: Clock Crawler
description:
A bug accidentally fell and landed on a Cuckoo Clock.Navigate the bug to the hidden maze exit.

Instruction

  • Hold on to left mouse click to move the bug.
  • Space bar to jump
  • Some of the walls are breakable . If the bug senses it , An exclamation mark will appear
  • Escape from the circular maze and search for the hidden maze exit
  • Avoid clock hands and cuckoo birds
